Aries.Notes: Aries, "The Ram", is one of the constellations of the zodiac. Notable objects: NGC 772 (an unbarred spiral galaxy w/ a notable supernova); Arp 276 (a pair of interacting galaxies NGC 935, the northern member of the pair, & IC 1801).
captions: The constellation Aries as it can be seen with the naked eye
Aries depicted in an early medieval manuscript, c.1000
